hymn.title: What grace, O Lord, and beauty shone

layout.singingstanza: What grace, O Lord, and beau -- ty shone A -- round Thy steps be -- low! What pa -- tient love was seen in all Thy life and death of woe!

lyrics.stanza: What grace, O Lord, and beauty shone Around Thy steps below! What patient love was seen in all Thy life and death of woe!
Forever on Thy burdened heart A weight of sorrow hung, Yet no ungentle, murm'ring word Escaped Thy silent tongue.
Thy foes did hate, despise, revile, Thy friends unfaithful prove; Unwearied in forgiveness still, Thy heart could only love!
